sentences.en: A few lines of rhyming doggerel don't count as poetry.
sentences.cn: 几行押韵的蹩脚诗算不上是诗.

sentences.en: Above doggerel that will certainly have to be rewritten.
sentences.cn: 上面那首打油诗必定也要重新改写.

sentences.en: Doggerel: " This year is the most well - being of the people who did not share. "
sentences.cn: 顺口溜说: “ 今年最幸福的人就是没股票的人. ”

sentences.en: During heartbreak , love is a doggerel, caustic and mocking, eloquent and glib.
sentences.cn: 相恨的时候, 爱情是一首打油诗, 嘲弄讥讽 、 各逞其能.

sentences.en: He had heard some silly doggerel that kept running through his mind.
sentences.cn: 他曾经听到过的几首无聊的打油诗不时在脑中浮现.
他把他的这首诗歌叫做打油诗.

sentences.en: Neither it nor his other theological versetreatises rise far above doggerel.
sentences.cn: 跟他的其他有关神学的议论诗一样,这不比拙劣的打油诗高明多少.

sentences.en: The following doggerel say that it is a tragedy.
sentences.cn: 以下的打油诗不能不说是一种悲哀.

sentences.en: Third , edIt'songs, doggerel, such as the riddle, and enhance memory.
sentences.cn: 编辑歌谣 、 顺口溜 、 谜语等, 增强记忆.

sentences.en: This rhymster has written mainly doggerel.
sentences.cn: 这个所谓诗作者主要写打油诗.

sentences.en: To have the catchy sound of a simple , repetitious rhyme or doggerel.
sentences.cn: 他曾经听过的一些一直在他脑海里浮现的无聊的打油诗.

trans.tran_cn: 拙劣的诗，打油诗，顺口溜
trans.tran_en: poetry that is silly or funny and not intended to be serious
